item.title: Oculus Rift review: Virtual reality is always almost here
item.description:
Oculus Rift review: Virtual reality is always almost here

For a long time, the hopes and dreams of many virtual reality fans could be summed up with two words: Oculus Rift. Helped by the rise of cheap smartphone displays, Oculus co-founder Palmer Luckey took a technology that most people considered a retro curiosity and convinced them that it could change the world.

item.title: Oculus Rift Review: Rejoice, for the Age of [:] ) Has Begun
item.description:
Oculus Rift Review: Rejoice, for the Age of [:] ) Has Begun

Its hard to imagine a phrase more loaded than "the Oculus Rift is here." While people have been talking and writing about the virtual-reality headset since 2012, it's always qualified with words like "developer kit" or "prototype" or "pre-release version."
